pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variational Mode Decomposition Based Machine Learning Models // Application of Variational Mode Decomposition based different Machine Learning models for univariate time series forecasting. For method details see (i) K. Dragomiretskiy and D. Zosso (2014) doi:10.1109/TSP.2013.2288675; (ii) Pankaj Das (2020) http://krishi.icar.gov.in/jspui/handle/123456789/44138.
